headline: Moderna explores outside financing for vaccine trials, shares dip
summary: Investing.com -- Moderna Inc (BMV:MRNA) (NASDAQ:MRNA) shares fell 2.2% Thursday as the company confirmed it is seeking outside investment to support its late-stage vaccine programs. The move underscores the biotech firm’s effort to align capital efficiency with strategic advancement across its product pipeline amid slowing COVID-19 revenue.

headline: Is it Time to Dump Your Shares of Moderna?
summary: Moderna stock soared early in the pandemic thanks to sales of its coronavirus vaccine.  After soaring to success in the early days of the COVID-19 pandemic, Moderna (NASDAQ: MRNA) experienced a reversal of fortune.  The coronavirus vaccine maker has seen revenue plummet as demand for this flagship product -- Moderna's first to be approved -- has slipped.
